title: Pictures: The Eversource Hartford Marathon - Community
text:
Caption Hartford Marathon 2015 Melanie Stengel / Special to the Courant Hartford Marathon-HARTFORD-Jonas Hampton ccrosses the line to win the Eversource Hartford Marathon. Melanie Stengel/Special to the Courant
Hartford Marathon-HARTFORD-Jonas Hampton ccrosses the line to win the Eversource Hartford Marathon. Melanie Stengel/Special to the Courant
(Melanie Stengel / Special to the Courant) Hartford Marathon 2015 Melanie Stengel / Special to the Courant Start of the the Eversource Hartford Marathon Saturday morning on Capital Avenue.
Start of the the Eversource Hartford Marathon Saturday morning on Capital Avenue.
(Melanie Stengel / Special to the Courant) See more galleries The Eversource Hartford Marathon took place on Saturday morning starting on Capitol Avenue at 8 a.m. The full event included a marathon, half marathon, 5K race, and children's race. The event was followed up with hydration and food, live music, and general celebration. Connecticut's own Jonas Hampton won the race. He was the first CT resident to win the race in 21 years.
Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant
